list_definition.definition: to take or come out of a coiled or wound position

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He unwound the bandage from his ankle.

list_definition.definition: to relax after a period of tension

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Give me a chance to unwind!
